# Approach

## Introduction to different monuments in NYC public parks

I was looking for a dataset that was relevant to me. As a New Yorker who enjoys spending time in city parks, I often wondered about the many monuments that surround the area. I was curious if there were any interesting historical facts about how these monuments came to be. I was able to find a dataset on the NYC Open Data website that offered a recent list of monuments maintained by the NYC Parks Department.
